reviewtext: Bang for buck, this is THE best and most versatile  all around digital camera to get.  I recommend that you buy 8 NiMH batteries and a charger.  The supplied alkaline batteries are just to get you started.  I also  recommend a 16 or 32 MB memory card if you intend to use this camera while  disk adapter.  It does come with a serial cable for PC and Mac as well as a  video cable for viewing on your TV.For turning your digital photos into  real prints, I've had good luck with EZ Prints ([...]  You use  their free software to send them your photos and your prints arrive in the  mail.  This overcomes the last drawback of digital cameras.  There may be  other similar services that do this so shop around for the best  picture you just took, just double-click the 'screen' button. This way you  won't have to close the camera to switch modes.
